6.63: Increased  Mass Serpent Ward cooldown from 100/80/60 to 110 on each level.
6.82: Rescaled  Shackles manacost from 110/130/155/185 to 140/150/160/170. Increased  Mass Serpent Ward cooldown from 110 to 120.
6.20: Increased  Hexed unit model slightly.  Shackles Now deals 40 damage per second to the target. Reduced duration from 3/4/5/6 to 2.5/3.25/4/4.75.
6.79: Mass Serpent Ward Increased number of wards from 8 to 10. The wards are now placed so that the center of the formation is empty (square-like formation).
6.78: Increased  Mass Serpent Ward attack damage from 39-43/54-58/69-73 to 40-45/55-60/70-75. Increased  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Mass Serpent Ward attack damage from 53-59/74-79/94-100 to 85-90/105-110/125-130.
6.64: Renamed Forked Lightning into  Ether Shock.  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Mass Serpent Ward No longer increases number of wards from 8 to 10. Now increases the wards' attack damage from 39-43/54-58/69-73 to 53-59/74-79/94-100.
6.57: Increased base  strength from 16 to 19.  Mass Serpent Ward Reduced manacost from 200/350/610 to 200/350/600. Reduced cooldown from 120 on each level to 100/80/60. Increased duration from 40 to 45.
6.17: Reduced attack range from 550 to 500. Reduced movement speed from 280 to 275.
6.10: Reduced  Hex duration from 2/3/4/5 to 1/2/3/4. Increased  Mass Serpent Ward cooldown from 100 to 120.
6.71: Increased  Ether Shock damage from 75/150/225/300 to 80/160/240/320.
6.70: Reduced  Ether Shock cooldown from 10 to 8.
6.59: Increased model size of  Hexed units a bit.
6.72: Increased base attack damage from 21-28 to 26-33 (total attack damage is now 47-54).  Ether Shock Reduced number of targets from 3/4/6/7 to 1/3/5/7. Increased damage from 80/160/240/320 to 140/200/260/320.
6.60: Reduced  Hex duration from 1/2/3/4 to 1.25/2/2.75/3.5. Reduced  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Mass Serpent Ward number of wards from 12 to 10.
6.84: Increased base  strength and gain from 19 + 1.6 to 21 + 1.8.  Hex no longer applies Break on the target.
6.58: Increased  Mass Serpent Ward cast range from 350 ( 400) to 500.
